description: Unique surrogate key for the substitution row; used to identify this mapping between parts.
Identifier of the primary/original part in this mapping; references the parts master.
Identifier of the approved substitute part that can be used in place of the original; references the same parts master.
Free-text notes describing substitution rationale, vendor/brand, conditions, or storage location; optional.
System timestamp for the most recent update to this record, by any process or user.
Timestamp recorded for the latest user-driven change to this record; field name suggests a user identifier but stores a datetimeâ€”confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who originally created this record; typically a username or employee ID.
Timestamp when the record was first created by a user.
Identifier of the user who last modified this record.
Timestamp of the most recent user modification to this record.
